insert into COURSE_TEMPLATE
COURSE_NAME,
CATEGORY_ID,
LOCATION_ID,
CIRCLE_ID,
PARTNER_ID,
ADDRESS_ID,

NO_REFUND_DATE,

BOOKING_TYPE,
START_UPON_ARRIVAL,
START_TIME1,
FINISH_TIME1,
START_TIME2,
FINISH_TIME2,
REG_ADDRESS_ID,
REFERENCE,
COURSE_INTRO,
QUIZ,
CERTIFICATION,
OPEN_COURSE_REQUIREMENT,
SUITABLE_STUDENT,
PREREQUEST,
HIGH_SCORE_REWARD,
STUDY_DAY_NOTE,
TEACHING_MATERIAL_INTRO,
QUESTION_BANK,
QUALITY_ASSURANCE,
PASS_AGREEMENT,
EXTRACURRICULAR,
CONTACT,
REG_PHONE,
OUTLINE,
GOAL,
CLASS_TEACHER,
TEACHING_AND_EXERCISE,
QUESTION_SESSION,
TRAIL,
ASSIGNMENTS,
MARKING,
BONUS_SERVICE,
DOWNLOAD_MATERIALS,
TEACHING_MATERIAL_FEE,
TEACHING_METHOD,
CLASS_TYPE,
DISCOUNT,
RATING,
BOOKING_TOTAL,
SCHOOLTIME_DAY,
SCHOOLTIME_WEEK,

mapper.update:
update COURSE_TEMPLATE
COURSE_NAME = #{courseName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CATEGORY_ID = #{categoryId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
LOCATION_ID = #{locationId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
CIRCLE_ID = #{circleId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
PARTNER_ID = #{partnerId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
ADDRESS_ID = #{addressId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
PRICE = #{price,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
ORIGINAL_PRICE = #{originalPrice,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
CASHBACK = #{cashback,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
COMMISSION = #{commission,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
SERVICE_CHARGE = #{serviceCharge,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
LAST_MODIFY_TIME = #{lastModifyTime,typeHandler=com.ishangke.edunav.dataaccess.typeHandler.CalendarTypeHandler},
CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,typeHandler=com.ishangke.edunav.dataaccess.typeHandler.CalendarTypeHandler},
ENABLED = #{enabled,jdbcType=INTEGER},
COURSE_HOUR_NUM = #{courseHourNum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
COURSE_HOUR_LENGTH = #{courseHourLength,jdbcType=INTEGER},
CLASS_SIZE = #{classSize,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
POPULARITY = #{popularity,jdbcType=INTEGER},
START_DATE = #{startDate,typeHandler=com.ishangke.edunav.dataaccess.typeHandler.CalendarTypeHandler},
FINISH_DATE = #{finishDate,typeHandler=com.ishangke.edunav.dataaccess.typeHandler.CalendarTypeHandler},
CUTOFF_DATE = #{cutoffDate,typeHandler=com.ishangke.edunav.dataaccess.typeHandler.CalendarTypeHandler},
NO_REFUND_DATE = #{noRefundDate,typeHandler=com.ishangke.edunav.dataaccess.typeHandler.CalendarTypeHandler},
CASHBACK_DATE = #{cashbackDate,typeHandler=com.ishangke.edunav.dataaccess.typeHandler.CalendarTypeHandler},
BOOKING_TYPE = #{bookingType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
START_UPON_ARRIVAL = #{startUponArrival,jdbcType=INTEGER},
START_TIME1 = #{startTime1,jdbcType=INTEGER},
FINISH_TIME1 = #{finishTime1,jdbcType=INTEGER},
START_TIME2 = #{startTime2,jdbcType=INTEGER},
FINISH_TIME2 = #{finishTime2,jdbcType=INTEGER},
REG_ADDRESS_ID = #{regAddressId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REFERENCE = #{reference,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
COURSE_INTRO = #{courseIntro,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
QUIZ = #{quiz,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CERTIFICATION = #{certification,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OPEN_COURSE_REQUIREMENT = #{openCourseRequirement,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SUITABLE_STUDENT = #{suitableStudent,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PREREQUEST = #{prerequest,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
HIGH_SCORE_REWARD = #{highScoreReward,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STUDY_DAY_NOTE = #{studyDayNote,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TEACHING_MATERIAL_INTRO = #{teachingMaterialIntro,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
QUESTION_BANK = #{questionBank,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
QUALITY_ASSURANCE = #{qualityAssurance,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PASS_AGREEMENT = #{passAgreement,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EXTRACURRICULAR = #{extracurricular,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CONTACT = #{contact,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REG_PHONE = #{regPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OUTLINE = #{outline,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
GOAL = #{goal,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CLASS_TEACHER = #{classTeacher,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TEACHING_AND_EXERCISE = #{teachingAndExercise,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
QUESTION_SESSION = #{questionSession,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TRAIL = #{trail,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ASSIGNMENTS = #{assignments,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MARKING = #{marking,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BONUS_SERVICE = #{bonusService,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DOWNLOAD_MATERIALS = #{downloadMaterials,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TEACHING_MATERIAL_FEE = #{teachingMaterialFee,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TEACHING_METHOD = #{teachingMethod,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CLASS_TYPE = #{classType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
DISCOUNT = #{discount,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
RATING = #{rating,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
BOOKING_TOTAL = #{bookingTotal,jdbcType=INTEGER},
SCHOOLTIME_DAY = #{schooltimeDay,jdbcType=INTEGER},
SCHOOLTIME_WEEK = #{schooltimeWeek,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select count(ID) from COURSE_TEMPLATE where DELETED = 0

select
,
,
,
,
,
,
,
,
from COURSE_TEMPLATE COURSE_TEMPLATE left join COURSE_TEMPLATE_TEACHER COURSE_TEMPLATE_TEACHER ON COURSE_TEMPLATE_TEACHER.COURSE_TEMPLATE_ID = COURSE_TEMPLATE.ID left join TEACHER TEACHER ON TEACHER.ID = COURSE_TEMPLATE_TEACHER.TEACHER_ID left join COURSE_TEMPLATE_CLASS_PHOTO COURSE_TEMPLATE_CLASS_PHOTO ON COURSE_TEMPLATE_CLASS_PHOTO.COURSE_TEMPLATE_ID = COURSE_TEMPLATE.ID left join CLASS_PHOTO CLASS_PHOTO ON CLASS_PHOTO.ID = COURSE_TEMPLATE_CLASS_PHOTO.CLASS_PHOTO_ID left join PARTNER PARTNER ON PARTNER.ID = COURSE_TEMPLATE.PARTNER_ID left join CATEGORY CATEGORY ON CATEGORY.ID = COURSE_TEMPLATE.CATEGORY_ID left join CIRCLE CIRCLE ON CIRCLE.ID = COURSE_TEMPLATE.CIRCLE_ID left join LOCATION LOCATION ON LOCATION.ID = COURSE_TEMPLATE.LOCATION_ID left join ADDRESS ADDRESS ON ADDRESS.ID = COURSE_TEMPLATE.ADDRESS_ID left join (select COURSE_TEMPLATE.ID COURSETEMPLATE_ID,
from COURSE_TEMPLATE left join ADDRESS ADDRESS ON ADDRESS.ID = COURSE_TEMPLATE.ADDRESS_ID) temp on COURSE_TEMPLATE.ID = temp.COURSETEMPLATE_ID where COURSE_TEMPLATE.DELETED = 0 AND COURSE_TEMPLATE.ID = #{id}

select
from COURSE_TEMPLATE COURSE_TEMPLATE where COURSE_TEMPLATE.DELETED = 0 AND COURSE_TEMPLATE.ID = #{id}
